name: SpinPixel
description:
How to paint:

Move the cursor over the canvas and left click to paint. Click on the yellow button of the motor to change the spin speed. Spacebar changes color. Click on the camera button to document your mess or masterpiece.  The paint will remain wet and fluid until you change colors.

Accessing your paintings:

For windows go into the project files and you will find your paintings under savedImages file.

For  Mac right click on the application, navigate to the assets folder and open the savedImages file in order to find your paintings.

Music sourced under creative commons: https://freesound.org/people/Sirkoto51/sounds/360608/
